message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe this price reflects the value it holds for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is significantly below its true worth. I could consider letting it go for $11,000.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500? I think that's a more reasonable compromise.
